channel.title: Nginx on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Node.js and Nginx on Ubuntu
item.description: In this tutorial I will show how to install and configure Node.js and Nginx on you Ubuntu server. Installing Dependencies The only dependency we really need is the build-essential package in order to be able to compile the Node.js source code. # Make sure to download the latest repos. sudo apt-get update # Required to run `make` command. sudo apt-get install build-essential # If you need to use https. sudo apt-get install libssl-dev # My favorite text editor.
